content: Lifestyle General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 May 2019Any advice regarding any topic that a 22 year old should know? Or what would you tell your 22 year old self?I'm currently 22 years old now and looking to improve on myself and my knowledge.. Does anyone have any advice as to what I should focus on?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
SWShaun Wq LimLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019To my 22yo self:Be happy and do your bestEverything will be work out, stop overthinking Save more Invest more1 comment2
Question Poster07 Jun 2019Thank you for your reply(:

Heng Kai LeLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Don’t be lazy and just do the necessary to apply for the overseas student exchange program :pMy advice is rather personal. So I highly recommend that you read “_What I Wish I Knew When I Was 20”. _The insights there will blow your mind and shift your paradigms2 comments1

Question Poster07 Jun 2019Thank you for your reply! Is that a book? May I know by which author?(:Heng Kai Le07 Jun 2019There you go!
What I Wish I Knew When I Was 20
A Crash Course on Making Your Place in the World
by Tina Seelig

Many reviews here:
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/6081261-what-i-wish-i-knew-when-i-was-20

Billy Ko, President - Investment Club at Singapore Institute Of TechnologyLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Grab every opportunity that come by (if possible), exposing yourself to these opportunities will give you an edge over others. Open as many doors in your life because some day, some time, doors will close, so always have more than 1 avenue for you. Dab your toes in various stints, try out different things while you can (except the vices), so that you can eliminate what you don't want in life. What you have at 22 is time, so spend your time wisely. Read a lot, mingle with different people. Think long-term, don't be overwhelmed with the short-term stuffs :)1 comment1
Question Poster07 Jun 2019Thank you for your reply(:
